evidence.claim: Navigant Healthcare utilizes AWS and Azure for cloud infrastructure.
Navigant Healthcare's services encompass HIPAA compliance and X12 EDI standards.
The company supports FHIR interoperability frameworks for health data exchange.
They leverage Snowflake for data analytics and storage optimization.
Navigant incorporates API integration practices for enhanced service delivery.

icp.icp_reason: Navigant Healthcare is involved in healthcare data transactions and X12 processes.
matched_use_cases: Data Exchange for Providers and Payers
